description: Creates a mad lib puzzle based using various settings.

parameters.name: theme
parameters.description: The theme to use when generating the mad lib puzzle

parameters.name: adjectiveCount
parameters.description: The number of adjectives to be generated for the puzzle.

parameters.name: nounCount
parameters.description: The number of nouns to be generated for the puzzle.

parameters.name: verbCount
parameters.description: The number of verbs to be generated for the puzzle.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the mad lib.
